```{r}
#| label: setup
#| echo: false
#| message: false

library("here")
library("fs")
library("tidyr")
library("dplyr")
library("stringr")
library("glue")
```

```{r}
#| label: print-list
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| results: 'asis'
dir_ls(regexp = ".qmd") |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  mutate(value = str_remove(value, ".qmd")) |> 
  filter(value != "index") |> 
  separate(value, into = c("order", "value"), sep = 3) |> 
  mutate(
    order = 1:n(), 
    lab = str_remove(value, "_"), 
    out = glue("1. [{value}](http://www.jvcasillas.com/{value}.html)")
  ) |> 
  arrange(order) |> 
  pull(out)
```
